plugin.name: MCP Steroid
plugin.description:
MCP Steroid brings the full power of the IntelliJ Platform to AI agents through the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

IntelliJ platform works for AI agents as great as for human developers.

  • 9 MCP Tools: Control IntelliJ IDEA programmatically — execute code, take screenshots, discover actions, debug, and more
  • 58 MCP Resources: Comprehensive guides covering LSP, IDE operations, debugger, tests, VCS, and more
  • Vision Capabilities: AI agents can see your IDE with screenshots and OCR
  • Deep Integration: Access PSI, inspections, refactorings, and full IntelliJ Platform API
  • Human Oversight: Review and approve code execution with configurable safety controls

Compatible with all IntelliJ Platform-based IDEs: IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, GoLand, CLion, Rider, and more.

Requirements: IntelliJ IDEA 2025.3 or newer (build 253 or later).

Visit mcp-steroid.jonnyzzz.com for documentation and examples.
plugin.change-notes:
What's New in v0.89.0

Demo: Codex Debugs in IntelliJ IDEA

[![Codex debugs an application in IntelliJ IDEA](https://img.youtube.com/vi/HtDDNyAoLak/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/HtDDNyAoLak)

In this video, Codex debugs an application in IntelliJ IDEA. The demo is powered by the MCP Steroid plugin for IntelliJ-based IDEs, https://mcp-steroid.jonnyzzz.com.

Codex Agent Output Support

Full support for Codex NDJSON output format — handles `mcp_tool_call` items with their distinct field names (`tool` instead of `name`, `arguments` instead of `input`), structured result objects, and `reasoning` items rendered as `[thinking]` blocks. Raw and decoded agent logs are now saved per prompt run.

Prompt System Overhaul

  • Migrated all articles from multi-file (header + kts) to single-file `.md` format
  • Merged `-see-also.md` files into main article files
  • Added `###_NO_AUTO_TOC_###` / `###_EXCLUDE_FROM_AUTO_TOC_###` directives for fine-grained TOC control
  • Per-article read tests are now auto-generated
  • Removed old-format article support from buildSrc codegen
  • Migrated tool descriptions to prompt article resources

    • Docker Test Infrastructure Refactoring

    Major refactoring of the Docker container process runner and agent infrastructure:

  • Replaced `runInContainer` with `startProcessInContainer` across all drivers
  • Consolidated container process types into `docker-container-exec-detached.kt`
  • Channel-driven stdin for `ConsoleDriver` (replacing per-line docker exec)
  • Real-time console pumping in `ConsoleAwareAgentSession` with raw + decoded log files
  • Interactive docker exec support (`-i` flag)
  • Coroutines `Channel` for `ProcessRunner` output (no busy loop)

    • DPAIA Arena Testing

    Introduced Docker-based A/B comparison testing infrastructure (DPAIA — Developer Productivity AI Assessment) for measuring agent effectiveness with vs without MCP Steroid. Includes automated test pipeline with iterative improvement loops, bare git repo caching, JDK auto-configuration, Maven/Gradle import awaiting, and per-product smoke tests.

    Plugin & Build Improvements

  • Extracted plugin build into dedicated `ij-plugin/` subproject
  • Plugin deployment hot-reload via `deployPlugin` task
  • MCP server now starts at IDE startup via `AppLifecycleListener`
  • `execution_id` made optional in `steroid_execute_feedback`
  • Release builds only include release notes in `plugin.xml` (skip for snapshots)
  • Upload LICENSE to GitHub releases with full URLs

    • Settings & UI

  • New MCP Steroid project settings page (Tools > MCP Steroid) with copy buttons and structured connection info
  • Human review workflow reworked: renamed actions, `isReviewRequired()` logic, Always Allow option with warning icon
  • Screenshot capture now includes modal dialogs

    • Agent Compatibility

  • Claude Code 2.1.x new structured event format support in `ClaudeOutputFilter` (handles both old streaming and new structured formats)
  • Output filters pass through unknown JSON events (future-proof)
  • Generic `toolDetail()` extracts human-readable summary for all known tools

    • Stability & Bug Fixes

  • Fixed AIPromoWindowAdvisor 8-minute startup deadlock in Docker containers
  • Fixed Islands Theme onboarding dialog blocking test containers
  • Fixed `CodeButcher` import extraction from triple-quoted string literals
  • Fixed AiAgentDriver NPE with lazy property ordering
  • Fixed DISPLAY env var propagation in container processes
  • Fixed Docker reaper image tagging and container ancestry filter
  • Renamed "IntelliJ MCP Steroid" to "MCP Steroid" across codebase

    • Build & Infrastructure

  • KtBlocks compilation test infrastructure for verifying code examples in prompt articles
  • `ScriptClassLoaderFactory` interface for test classpath isolation
  • Compilation tests made stable across build re-runs
  • Increased IDE window detection timeout with better diagnostics
  • Concurrent test run protection documented (shared `idea-sandbox/` corruption)

    • Full release notes: mcp-steroid.jonnyzzz.com/releases/0.89.0/
